H0.text: What is the common name of the cooking ingredient from the hard fat of kidneys and loins of oxen, famously sold under the Atora brand. Tallow

H1.text: What is the common name of the cooking ingredient from the hard fat of kidneys and loins of oxen, famously sold under the Atora brand. Lard

H2.text: What is the common name of the cooking ingredient from the hard fat of kidneys and loins of oxen, famously sold under the Atora brand. Ghee

H3.text: What is the common name of the cooking ingredient from the hard fat of kidneys and loins of oxen, famously sold under the Atora brand. Suet

A4.text: Suet is the raw, hard fat of beef, lamb or mutton found around the loins and kidneys.

A5.text: Suet is rendered into tallow by melting and extended simmering, followed by straining, then cooling.
